LanguageData.Bullet_Scraptooth.label: scraptooth bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Scraptooth.label: feral pistols
LanguageData.Gun_Scraptooth.description: "Scraptooth" are Improvised pistols, manufactured by ferals. There are knuckles in front of these pistols, to make your meat tender.
LanguageData.Gun_Scraptooth.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Scraptooth.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_ScatterStick.label: shrapnel
LanguageData.Gun_ScatterStick.label: feral scattergun
LanguageData.Gun_ScatterStick.description: The "scatter stick" is a improvised shotgun. Deadly, but extremely short range and long reload. It also has an axe in front, for the situation that shoots can't finish off the target.
LanguageData.Gun_ScatterStick.tools.0.label: edge
LanguageData.Gun_ScatterStick.tools.1.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ScatterStick.tools.2.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Thrasher.label: thrasher bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Thrasher.label: feral rifle
LanguageData.Gun_Thrasher.description: The "thrasher" is a improvised assault rifle with a crude fire mechanism. High firepower, shorter range. It even has a cool bayonet on the front.
LanguageData.Gun_Thrasher.tools.0.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Gun_Thrasher.tools.1.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Thrasher.tools.2.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Crucifier.label: harpoon
LanguageData.Gun_Crucifier.label: feral anti-material rifle
LanguageData.Gun_Crucifier.description: Big brother of the other feral makeshift weapons, the "crucifier" is a massive anti-material rifle. Slow fire rate, long range, impressive fire power. If the enemy is too close, the crucifier can also be used as a pike by taking advantage of its length.
LanguageData.Gun_Crucifier.tools.0.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Gun_Crucifier.tools.1.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Crucifier.tools.2.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Deathdealer.label: deathdealer bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Deathdealer.label: feral submachine guns
LanguageData.Gun_Deathdealer.description: The "Deathdealer"s are a crude improvised SMGs, lethal in close quarters and features a high magazine capacity. Also, you can stab your enemy's back with these stab thingies.
LanguageData.Gun_Deathdealer.tools.0.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Gun_Deathdealer.tools.1.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Deathdealer.tools.2.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Gnasher.label: gnasher nail
LanguageData.Gun_Gnasher.label: feral nail gun
LanguageData.Gun_Gnasher.description: "Gnasher" is a heavily modified nail gun. Shoots at a very high rate of fire, but is very inaccurate and does only little damage.
LanguageData.Gun_Gnasher.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Gnasher.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Scorcher.label: napalm
LanguageData.Gun_Scorcher.label: feral flamethrower
LanguageData.Gun_Scorcher.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Scorcher.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Thumper.label: rocket
LanguageData.Gun_Thumper.label: feral rocket launcher
LanguageData.Gun_Thumper.description: "Thumper" is a simple single-use makeshift rocket launcher.
LanguageData.Gun_Thumper.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Thumper.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_RatStick.label: rat stick
LanguageData.Gun_RatStick.label: feral rat sticks
LanguageData.Gun_RatStick.description: Javelins tied with explosive boomrat tumor.
LanguageData.Gun_RatStick.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Gun_RatStick.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.Bullet_SkullBuster.label: bullet
LanguageData.Gun_SkullBuster.label: feral crank gun
LanguageData.Gun_SkullBuster.description: The "skullbuster" is an automatic heavy weapon with crank powered fire mechanism. Crude, but devastating weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_SkullBuster.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_SkullBuster.tools.1.label: barrel
